about_the_game:
Game Introduction

InEldritch Verdict, players will step into a mysterious world woven with cards and strategy. Here, every decision is filled with strategy, and every battle tests wisdom. Explore unknown territories, collect cards, challenge strong enemies, and uncover the secrets of the world.

Game Features[/h2]
Tactical Card Construction: Players will encounter various cards during their journey, needing to carefully choose to incorporate them into their own deck, and skillfully match them to exert strong combat power.

Diverse Maps Each adventure presents maps with different layouts and challenges, providing a unique gaming experience.

Rich Map Effects Each grid on the map may bring different effects, and strategically using them can gain combat advantages.

Customizable Map Skills Players can choose three map skills according to their style, and these skills will provide support throughout the game process.

Weapon and Relic System The game features a rich system of weapons and relics, and players can enhance their characters by collecting and equipping these items, providing additional combat advantages and strategic choices.

Gameplay Introduction

Card Combat Players use their constructed decks to fight, and they need to plan the order of playing cards and manage resources reasonably to deal with enemy attacks.

Exploration and Discovery Move on the map, trigger events, discover new cards, relics, and secrets, and these discoveries will help players gain advantages in subsequent battles.

Skills and Strategy Use map skills and combat strategies, and players can better cope with various situations in battles.

Difficulty and Challenges As the game progresses, players will face higher difficulty challenges, and they need to continuously adjust tactics and deck construction to overcome difficulties.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AnyGeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Eldritch Verdict": A dark fairy tale turn-based card game. Strategic planning and battle execution shape your adventure amid challenges. Progression customizes character growth for a deep, replayable experience.
